description:
A kind old man raises a dog named Shiro, but his greedy neighbor kills it.  When he spreads the ashes in the garden...   A rich young man is ill and wants an orange, but it`s the middle of summer.  The head clerk runs all over town and finally finds one.
A thief tries to break into a brewery but is knocked out by the owner.  The owner thinks the thief is dead and abandons him next to a river.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hanasaka Jiisan / Senryou Mikan / Gokuraku Dorubou
The Old Man Who Made Flowers Bloom / The Thousand Coin Orange / Paradise Thief
花さか爺さん / 千両みかん / 極楽泥棒
